name: galileosky-parser-windows
description: A comprehensive Windows application for parsing and managing Galileosky GPS tracking device data

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../mobile-frontend && npm install
scripts.dev-full: concurrently "npm run start-backend" "npm run start-frontend" "npm run start-mobile"
scripts.deploy-dev: cd backend && node deploy-config.js development && cd ../frontend && node deploy-config.js development
scripts.deploy-prod: cd backend && node deploy-config.js production && cd ../frontend && node deploy-config.js production
scripts.deploy-current: cd backend && node deploy-config.js current && cd ../frontend && node deploy-config.js current
scripts.clean: cd frontend && Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue && cd ../mobile-frontend && Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

author: haryowl
